channel.title: CVE Feed for wpxpo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpxpo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-36385|2024-08-02T16:45:56.324Z -- wpxpo -- postx%20%E2%80%93%20gutenberg%20post%20grid%20blocks
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in wpxpo PostX – Gutenberg Post Grid Blocks plugin <= 2.9.9 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-5223|2024-08-01T21:03:11.109Z -- wpxpo -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20postx
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin – PostX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's file uploading feature in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5326|2024-08-01T21:11:12.432Z -- wpxpo -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20postx
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin – PostX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'postx_presets_callback' function in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to change arbitrary options on affected sites. This can be used to enable new user registration and set the default role for new users to Administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-5758|2024-06-10T11:09:46.415Z -- wpxpo -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20postx
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin – PostX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the filterMobileText parameter in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5223|2024-05-30T03:34:27.682Z -- wpxpo -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20postx
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin – PostX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's file uploading feature in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-5326|2024-06-04T18:01:47.927Z -- wpxpo -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20postx
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin – PostX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'postx_presets_callback' function in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to change arbitrary options on affected sites. This can be used to enable new user registration and set the default role for new users to Administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-23512|2024-02-12T08:22:30.384Z -- wpxpo -- productx%20%E2%80%93%20woocommerce%20builder%20%26%20gutenberg%20woocommerce%20blocks
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in wpxpo ProductX – WooCommerce Builder & Gutenberg WooCommerce Blocks.This issue affects ProductX – WooCommerce Builder & Gutenberg WooCommerce Blocks: from n/a through 3.1.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-5223|2024-07-24T15:19:22.442Z -- wpxpo -- post%20grid%20gutenberg%20blocks%20and%20wordpress%20blog%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20postx
item.description: The Post Grid Gutenberg Blocks and WordPress Blog Plugin – PostX plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's file uploading feature in all versions up to, and including, 4.1.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Author-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
